story: From a scrawny farm boy, Kael endured. Years bled into decades, each sunrise a brutal reminder of his goal. Frozen peaks yielded to scorching deserts in his relentless pursuit of mastery. His blade sang a song of hardship, each scar a testament to his unwavering dedication. Finally, the whispers began: Kael, the Unbroken, the greatest swordsman the world had ever known.
